Module kivakit.core.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.filesystem

Class FileCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.filesystem.FileCache
  • public class FileCache
extends java.lang.Object
    A file cache with the given root. Resources can be copied into the cache with add(Resource, CopyMode, ProgressReporter). Files can be retrieved with file(FileName).
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

      • FileCache

        public FileCache​(Folder cacheFolder)
        Parameters:
        cacheFolder - The cache folder where files should be stored

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public File add​(Resource resource,
                CopyMode mode,
                ProgressReporter reporter)
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to add to the cache
        mode - How the resource should be copied
        reporter - The progress reporter to call as the file is being copied into the cache

      • file

        public File file​(FileName name)
        Returns:
        The given file in this cache

      • folder

        public Folder folder​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns:
